resources.string: Secret words are scattered around Edinburgh University central area which are taken from a song. The objective of this game is to collect these words and guess the song. A map guides you to the location of hidden words and you can discover them by clicking on them when you are within 2 metres of them. The location of each word is represented by a coloured marker, the colour representing how interesting the word is.

Very easy shows all of the word locations and has very interesting, interesting/ not boring and boring markers. Easy shows all of the word locations and has interesting/not boring and boring markers. Medium shows 75% of the word locations and has interesting, not boring and boring markers. Hard shows 50% of the word locations and has not boring and boring markers. Very hard shows 25% of the word locations and all markers are unclassified.
